definitions.definition: The beliefs, ideas, or thoughts of mystics.
A doctrine of direct communication or spiritual intuition of divine truth.
A transcendental union of soul or mind with the divine reality or divinity.
Obscure thoughts and speculations.
The phase of the moon when it is in conjunction with the sun.
The moon when it is in conjunction with the sun.
The phase of the moon when it is waxing.
The moon when it is waxing.
The day when the new moon is first seen or is expected to appear.
(An instance of) meaningless nonsense with an outward appearance of being impressive and legitimate.
(An instance of) excessively contrived, hackneyed, or sentimental material in a film, television programme, theater production, etc.
A film, television programme, theater production, etc., containing excessively contrived, hackneyed, or sentimental material.
A genre of blues song or music, often characterized by sexual innuendos or satire.
An active and enterprising person; one who is motivated or inclined to excel; one who strives to achieve success or improvement.
definitions.example: He's a promising young go-getter, but he needs to learn some things about office politics.

definitions.definition: To require (something) as a condition of a contract or agreement.
To specify, promise or guarantee something in an agreement.
To acknowledge the truth of; not to challenge. E.g. "The defense stipulates that the witness has identified my client."
Having stipules; that is, having outgrowths borne on either side of the base of the leafstalk.
A loud sucking noise made in eating or drinking
A mouthful of liquid
To eat or drink noisily.
definitions.example: They sat in the kitchen slurping their spaghetti.

definitions.definition: To make a loud sucking noise.
definitions.example: The mud slurped under our shoes.

definitions.definition: A drug specifically developed to replace an illegal recreational drug (so as to circumvent existing drug laws), usually by modifying its molecular structure.
The substance inside bones which produces blood cells.
A kind of vegetable like a large courgette/zucchini or squash.
The pith of certain plants.
The essence; the best part.
The inner meaning or purpose.
Bone marrow biopsy.
definitions.example: This patient will have a marrow today.

definitions.definition: Semen.
A friend, pal, buddy, mate.
definitions.example: Cheers marrow!

definitions.definition: One of a pair; a match; a companion; an intimate associate.
Grandmother
Excessive vanity.
Boastful, unwarranted pride in one's accomplishments or qualities.
Vain, ostentatious display.
A regarding of oneself with undue favor.
To boast; to act in a vain manner.
Grieved and disappointed, especially with the loss of a beloved person or thing, such as the repudiation of a romantic relationship.
A place or pit from which sand is excavated.
A children’s play area consisting of a large container filled with sand.
A small-scale illustrative model of the theater of war in the Middle East.
To render valid.
To check or prove the validity of; verify.
To have its validity successfully proven.
definitions.example: The data file cannot be imported because it doesn't validate.

definitions.definition: A trade fair
A piece of excavating equipment consisting of a digging bucket or scoop on the end of an articulated arm, drawn backwards to move earth.
A multi-purpose tractor with a front-mounted loading bucket and a rear-mounted digging bucket.
To excavate using such equipment.
The deck of an aircraft carrier, where aircraft can land and take off.
The cockpit of a large aircraft.
definitions.example: the flight deck of the Airbus A380

definitions.definition: The vegetable Allium ampeloprasum var. porrum, having edible leaves and an onion-like bulb but with a milder flavour than the onion.
Any of several species of Allium, broadly resembling the domesticated plant in appearance in the wild.
A sweater or similar garment made of wool.
A sheep not yet shorn.
A piece of woolwork.
Made of wool.
definitions.example: Put on a woolly jumper and turn down the thermostat.

definitions.definition: Having a thick, soft texture, as if made of wool.
definitions.example: There was nothing left in the fruit bowl but a brown banana and a couple of woolly pears.

definitions.definition: (of thinking, principles, etc.) Based on emotions rather than logic.
definitions.example: That's the sort of woolly thinking that causes wars to start.

definitions.definition: Unclear, fuzzy, hazy, cloudy.
Clothed in wool.
A woolly back; someone from the area around Liverpool, not from Liverpool itself.
A male who débuts, or appears for the first time.
The state or characteristic of being corpulent.
The day when God is expected to judge the world; end times.
Judgement day; the day of the Final Judgment; any day of decisive judgement or final dissolution.
Concerned with or predicting future universal destruction.
Given to or marked by forebodings or predictions of impending calamity.
Capable of causing widespread or total destruction.
A partially shaded area around the edges of a shadow, especially an eclipse.
A region around the edge of a sunspot, darker than the sun's surface but lighter than the middle of the sunspot.
An area of uncertainty or intermediacy between two mutually exclusive states or categories.
An area that lies on the edge of something; a fringe.
Something related to, connected to, and implied by, the existence of something else that is necessary for the second thing to be full and complete in its essential aspects.
(in "ischaemic penumbra", after a stroke) A region of the brain that has lost only some of its blood supply, and retains structural integrity but has lost function.
A call to do something, especially to come.
A notice summoning someone to appear in court, as a defendant, juror or witness.
A demand for surrender.
To serve someone with a summons.
To call people together; to convene.
To ask someone to come; to send for.
To order (goods) and have delivered
To rouse oneself to exert a skill.
To call a resource by magic.
To summons; convene.
The art or occupation of a mason.
definitions.example: He studied masonry for five years.

definitions.definition: The work or performance of a mason
definitions.example: The masonry was exquisite.

definitions.definition: That which is built by a mason; anything constructed of the materials used by masons, such as stone, brick, tiles, or the like. Dry masonry is applied to structures made without mortar.
definitions.example: The masonry was cracked.

definitions.definition: The craft, institution, or mysteries of Freemasons; Freemasonry.
A button or stud used to hold a sleeve cuff together.
definitions.example: Every gentleman needs at least one pair of cufflinks.

definitions.definition: A person who hoards money rather than spending it; one who is cheap or extremely parsimonious.
A kind of earth auger, typically large-bored and often hand-operated.
An alcoholic drink that looks and tastes like a soft drink.

The fruit of certain cacti of the genus Hylocereus, cultivated in Southeast Asia and Central and South America, having cerise-pink- or yellow-coloured skin and a white or pink sweet fleshy interior with black seeds.
The process of coining money.
Coins taken collectively; currency.
The creation of new words, neologizing.
Something which has been made or invented, especially a coined word; a neologism.
The process of creating something new.
The action of making or becoming extinct; annihilation.
The absorption or scattering of electromagnetic radiation emitted by astronomical objects by intervening dust and gas before it reaches the observer.
The inability to perceive multiple stimuli simultaneously
To cause, bring about (an event); to accomplish, to carry out (a wish, plan etc.).

A device which measures and records several physiological variables such as blood pressure, heart rate, respiration and skin conductivity while a series of questions is being asked to a subject, in an attempt to detect lies.
A mechanical instrument for multiplying copies of a writing, resembling multiple pantographs.
A collection of different works, either by one or several authors.
A group of letters that represent a single phoneme.
To administer a polygraph test to.
definitions.example: The FBI polygraphed the suspect but learned nothing because they already knew he was lying.

definitions.definition: A musical part or section higher than tenor and lower than soprano, formerly the part that performed a countermelody above the tenor or main melody.
A person or musical instrument that performs the alto part.
An alto saxophone
To rely on, trust, or expect
definitions.example: Can we count on you to help out?

definitions.definition: Of, relating to or exhibiting misogyny.
Someone or something of mixed kind or uncertain origin, especially a dog.
definitions.example: That dog is a mongrel; who knows what breed it could be!

definitions.definition: A thuggish, obnoxious, or contemptible person; (often preceded by "poor") a pitiable person.
The action of the verb to jog.
definitions.example: His jogging of my memory helped me recall what happened that day.

definitions.definition: The practice of running at a relatively slow pace for exercise.
To push slightly; to move or shake with a push or jerk, as to gain the attention of; to jolt.
definitions.example: jog one's elbow

definitions.definition: To shake, stir or rouse.
definitions.example: I tried desperately to jog my memory.

definitions.definition: To walk or ride forward with a jolting pace; to move at a heavy pace, trudge; to move on or along.
(exercise) To move at a pace between walking and running, to run at a leisurely pace.
To cause to move at an energetic trot.
definitions.example: to jog a horse

definitions.definition: To straighten stacks of paper by lightly tapping against a flat surface.
That which preserves from injury.
A storehouse.
Having the quality of preserving from loss, decay, or injury.
Relating to conservation.
A large greenhouse or hothouse for the display of plants
A glass-walled and -roofed room in a house
A school of music or drama
A male relative of one's generation, separated by one degree of marriage:
Co-brother-in-law: A male relative of one's generation, separated by two degrees of marriage:
Pudding (either sweet or savoury).
Penis.
Child's hand; child's fist.
An obsolete Russian unit of mass, equal to 40 Russian funt, or about 16.38 kg (approximately 36.11 pounds).
A Russian unit of mass used for kettlebells, now rounded off to 16 kg (about 35.274 pounds).
A certain breed of dog having short legs and a long trunk, including miniature, long-haired, and short-haired varieties.
Advice or support about marriage, especially in the form of professional counselling, and typically given to couples looking to overcome problems in a relationship.
A court whose surface is made of crushed shale, stone or brick.
An informal practice session
definitions.example: The players came to the stadium for the morning shootaround.

definitions.definition: A book with flexible binding.
(of a book) Having flexible binding.
Avowal
To declare openly and boldly, as something believed to be right; to own, acknowledge or confess frankly.
To bind or devote by a vow.
To acknowledge and justify, as an act done. See avowry.
To cancel funding for.
A light spear thrown with the hand and used as a weapon.
A metal-tipped spear thrown for distance in an athletic field event.
To pierce with a javelin.
A political right to disapprove of (and thereby stop) the process of a decision, a law etc.
An invocation of that right.
An authoritative prohibition or negative; a forbidding; an interdiction.
To use a veto against.
Of, relating to, or following a curriculum.
Apartment building
Such a situation
Not arguable; that cannot be reasonably argued against.
A calculation of an estimate of the value of some function outside the range of known values.
An inference about some hypothetical situation based on known facts.
The diametric opposite of interpolation.
Having goggle (prominent) eyes; with eyes widely opened.
A pregnant woman, especially one expecting her first child.
A woman whose partner is pregnant.
The large compound bone structure at the base of the spine that supports the legs. It consists of hip bone, sacrum and coccyx.
A funnel-shaped cavity, especially such a cavity in the kidney into which urine passes towards the ureter
A device which scans documents in order to convert them to a digital medium.
definitions.example: He put the picture in the scanner, then e-mailed a copy of it to his family.

definitions.definition: A radio receiver which iterates through a sequence of frequencies to detect signal.
A device which uses radiation (ultrasound, X-ray, etc.) to generate images of tissue or surfaces for diagnostic purposes.
A device which uses optics to detect printed data (such as a barcode).
One who scans.
A small flaw which spoils the appearance of something, a stain, a spot.
A moral defect; a character flaw.
To spoil the appearance of.
To tarnish (reputation, character, etc.); to defame.
Harsh and sharp, or bitter and not pleasant to the taste; acrid, pungent.
Angry, acid, and sharp in delivering argumentative replies: bitter, mean-spirited, sharp in language or tone.
Compliant.
Willing to do what pleases others; obliging.
Polite; showing respect.
Any of various practices involving romantic or sexual relationships with multiple partners with the knowledge and consent of all involved.
Material woven in the style of a basket.
The craft of making such material.
Women's underwear or nightclothes, now especially when lacy or designed to be seductive.
Linen goods collectively.
A physical exercise performed by jumping to a position with the legs spread wide and the hands touching overhead and then returning to a position with the feet together and the arms at the sides.
A toy figure of a person, with jointed limbs, that can be made to jump or dance by means of pulling attached strings.
Agent noun of pick; one who picks.
definitions.example: The apple picker climbed the tree.

definitions.definition: Any user interface control that selects something.
definitions.example: a date picker

definitions.definition: A machine for picking fibrous materials to pieces so as to loosen and separate the fibre.
The piece in a loom that strikes the end of the shuttle and impels it through the warp.
A priming wire for cleaning the vent, in ordnance.
(gold panning) A fragment of gold smaller than a nugget but large enough to be picked up.
One who removes defects from and finishes electrotype plates.
A pilferer.
A criticism done by ranting.
A wild, emotional, and sometimes incoherent articulation.

A type of dance step usually performed in clogs, and particularly (but not exclusively) associated with the English North West Morris tradition. The rant step consists of alternately bringing one foot across and in front of the other and striking the ground, with the other foot making a little hop.
To speak or shout at length in uncontrollable anger.
To criticize by ranting.
To speak extravagantly, as in merriment.
To dance rant steps.
Collectively, those layers of the Earth’s crust which primarily comprise stratified deposits.

The region of the uppermost atmosphere where temperature increases along with the altitude due to the absorption of solar ultraviolet radiation by ozone. The stratosphere extends from the tropopause (10–15 kilometers) to approximately 50 kilometers, where it is succeeded by the mesosphere.
A person who has autism.
Having autism, or pertaining to autism.
(and medically obsolete) Socially inept, self-absorbed, or stupid.
Used to express dislike: lame, uncool, stupid.
(4chan) Characterized by abnormal and unhealthy focus or persistence, and unhealthy hatred of opposition or criticism.
definitions.example: imagine being this autistic over a fictional character

definitions.definition: A strap, cord or rope with which to restrain an animal, often a dog.
A brace and a half; a tierce.
A set of three; three creatures of any kind, especially greyhounds, foxes, bucks, and hares; hence, the number three in general.
A string with a loop at the end for lifting warp threads, in a loom.
A leg rope.
To fasten or secure with a leash.
To curb, restrain
A prolonged cry, usually high-pitched, especially as of grief or anguish.
definitions.example: She let out a loud, doleful wail.

definitions.definition: Any similar sound as of lamentation; a howl.
definitions.example: A bird's wail in the night.

definitions.definition: A sound made by emergency vehicle sirens, contrasted with "yelp" which is higher-pitched and faster.
To cry out, as in sorrow or anguish.
To weep, lament persistently or bitterly.
To make a noise like mourning or crying.
definitions.example: The wind wailed and the rain streamed down.

definitions.definition: To lament; to bewail; to grieve over.
definitions.example: to wail one's death

definitions.definition: To perform with great liveliness and force.
To strike the skin in such a way as to produce a wale or welt.
To give a surface a texture of wales or welts.
To choose, select.
Of or pertaining to storms.
Characterized by, or proceeding from, a storm; subject to storms; agitated with strong winds and heavy rain.
definitions.example: a stormy season or a stormy day

definitions.definition: Proceeding from violent agitation or fury.
definitions.example: a stormy sound or stormy shocks

definitions.definition: Violent; passionate; rough.
definitions.example: stormy passions

definitions.definition: Dowdy, unkempt, or unfashionable.
definitions.example: She came to the door in a frumpy housedress and bedroom slippers.

definitions.definition: Bad-tempered.
To make concise; to abridge or summarize.
Brief, yet including all important information
A sacred act or ceremony in Christianity. In Catholic theology, a sacrament is defined as "an outward sign instituted by Christ to give grace."
(in particular) The Eucharist.
The consecrated Eucharist (especially the bread).
A thing which is regarded as possessing a sacred character or mysterious significance.
The oath of allegiance taken by soldiers in Ancient Rome; hence, any sacred ceremony used to impress an obligation; a solemn oath-taking; an oath.
To bind by an oath.
Creating a feeling of happiness
definitions.example: This is the best feel-good film you'll see this year.

definitions.definition: (grammar) The prepositional case.
Of, pertaining to, or of the nature of a preposition.
(grammar) Of the prepositional case.

A jet airplane with fixed wings that is capable of vertical takeoff and landing as well as hovering, and, in some cases, also capable of becoming airborne in a conventional manner by gaining airspeed on a runaway.
A large spoon with slots in it used to drain food.
One who has received a medal; one who has medalled.
definitions.example: Mark Spitz set a record as an Olympic gold medalist.

definitions.definition: An engraver, designer or collector of medals.
A proponent of revisionism
Of or pertaining to revisionism
A six-point score occurring when the ball enters possession of a team's player in the opponent's end zone.
definitions.example: Today I scored my first touchdown.

definitions.definition: A defensive action of grounding the ball in the team’s own in-goal to stop the play
A try (scoring play of grounding the ball in the opposing team’s in-goal)
The moment when an aircraft or spacecraft makes first or final contact with the ground during a landing.
definitions.example: The passengers audibly relaxed at touchdown.

definitions.definition: The moment of contact of a tornado with the ground.
